IConfigurationReceiver

public interface IConfigurationReceiver

com.android.tradefed.config.IConfigurationReceiver
Known Indirect Subclasses
TearDownPassThroughPreparer
TearDownPassThroughPreparer Allows for running tearDown on preparers that are included in a config as an object. 

Simple interface to represent object that accepts an IConfiguration.

Tests or other configuration objects should implement this interface if they need access to a IConfiguration they are included in.

Summary

Public methods

abstract void setConfiguration(IConfiguration configuration)

Injects the IConfiguration in use.

Public methods

setConfiguration

void setConfiguration (IConfiguration configuration)

Injects the IConfiguration in use.
